publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7958.1 Stewart Maxwell: Tobacco and Alcohol in Scotland—As an amendment to motion (S3M-7958) in the name of Dr Richard Simpson, after fifth "alcohol" insert "; regrets that the opposition parties recently voted against the Scottish Government’s proposal to introduce a minimum price for alcohol, particularly given that one of the principal methods used to deter smokers has been increasing the price of tobacco". Supported by: Christine Grahame*, Bill Kidd* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-7958.1 Tobacco and Alcohol in Scotland (lodged on 22 February 2011) Christina McKelvie*, Stewart Stevenson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Rob Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Stuart McMillan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*
S3M-7958.1 Tobacco and Alcohol in Scotland (lodged on 22 February 2011) Maureen Watt*, Liam McArthur*
